name: collab-studio-hub
description: This is a website that allows content creators to sign up and connect their respective platforms to the website and create a workspace. In the workspace the creator can add their editors. Creator will upload all sorts he has taken for the video in the workspace and editor with given access can download that and can start editing. After the editing the editor can upload the edited video on the workspace again. Different editors like thumbnail editors, caption editors etc. can also contribute in the workspace. After all the things done the creator is just one click away to publish the video on their respective platforms
author: swaparup_mukherjee
